item.title: Rob Thomas Talks Happiness, New Solo Album, Ryan Gosling Duet Hopes and the Dreamy Ballad Inspired by Shania Twain
item.description: “As you get older, you realize happiness is earned. It’s something you have to find, forge and build with the relationships you have, the people you love and the time you spend," says the singer, whos
